list_definition.definition: to put or blend together to form one mass

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She mixed the butter and sugar together
He mixed the blue with the yellow to make green paint.

list_definition.definition: to prepare or make by doing this

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She mixed the cement in a bucket.

list_definition.definition: to go together or blend successfully to form one mass

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: People of different races were mixing together happily.

list_definition.definition: the result of mixing things or people together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: London has an interesting racial mix.

list_definition.definition: a collection of ingredients used to make something
